Interface Hand


  • public interface Hand

    • Method Summary

      Adds a card to the hand.
      java.util.List<Card> getAllCards()
      Retrieves all cards in the hand.

    • Method Detail

      • addCard

        void addCard(Card card)
        Adds a card to the hand.
        Parameters:
        card - The card to add to the hand.

      • removeCard

        void removeCard(Card card)
        Removes the specified card in the hand.
        Parameters:
        card - The card to remove from the hand.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the card doesn't exist.

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Retrieves the number of cards in the hand.
        Returns:
        the number of cards left in the hand.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Specifies if the hand is empty or not
        Returns:
        true if the hand is empty, otherwise false.

      • getAllCards

        java.util.List<Card> getAllCards()
        Retrieves all cards in the hand.
        Returns:
        the list of all cards in the hand.

      • getCards

        java.util.List<Card> getCards(Card.Suit suit)
        Retrieves all cards that match the specified suit.
        Parameters:
        suit - The suit of the card.
        Returns:
        the list of all cards that match the specified suit in the hand.

      • sortCards

        void sortCards(boolean inAscendingOrder)
        Sorts the cards in ascending or descending order.
        Parameters:
        inAscendingOrder - The order to use, true for ascending, false for descending.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Empties the hand by removing all cards from the hand.
